description:
VMAnomalyMonitoringPushSpec defines metrics push configuration

VMAnomaly uses prometheus text exposition format

basicAuth.description: Basic auth defines basic authorization configuration

bearer.description: BearerAuth defines authorization with Authorization: Bearer header

extraLabels.description: ExtraLabels defines a set of labels to attach to the pushed metrics

healthPath.description: HealthPath defines absolute or relative URL address where to check availability of the remote webserver

tenantID.description: TenantID defines for VictoriaMetrics Cluster version only, tenants are identified by accountID, accountID:projectID or multitenant.

timeout.description: Timeout for the requests, passed as a string

url.description: defines target url for push requests
